name: Child Frenzy
description:
Child Frenzy is a 2 - 4 players versus/party game in which you have to take down you're brothers/sisters by using toys ! The child's imaginary will change the level during your epic battles, so never think it's over ;) Mother will also influence the course, giving you new powerfull items.

You'll need to observ the level and aim to your friends properly. Having good reflex is always an advantage. The last player standing win the game !

Console controllers required.

The GGJ webpage : https://globalgamejam.org/2019/games/child-frenzy
